Usage

geom_flag2(
  mapping = NULL,
  data = NULL,

  na.rm = FALSE,
  show.legend = NA,

  ...

Examples

data(lflags)
#> Warning: data set ‘lflags’ not found
set.seed(1234)
d <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(10), y = rnorm(10),
  country = sample(c("ar", "fr"), 10, TRUE),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
ggplot2::ggplot(d, ggplot2::aes(x = x, y = y, country = country, size = x)) +
  geom_flag() +
  scale_country()
#> Error in geom_flag(): could not find function "geom_flag"
